main event: A civilian in Sarasota, Florida reported seeing a frosty white light in the sky which vanished after a few seconds.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 60 seconds in total.
The source of the report was a civilian, and the conclusion was that there was insufficient data for evaluation.
The observer did not notice any physical evidence related to the sighting.
The report included a status questionnaire to gather detailed information about the sighting.
The letter acknowledged the civilian's contribution to the study of unidentified aerial phenomena.
sighted object: frosty white light in the sky
